Weather: Westerly rain bands hitting but more respite expected from freezing temps and incessant rain https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-westerly-rain-bands-hitting-but-more-respite-expected-from-freezing-temps-and-incessant-rain/ZI4WT2GAKFBLNHH7DPBKAHNE6U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-westerly-rain-bands-hitting-but-more-respite-expected-from-freezing-temps-and-incessant-rain/ZI4WT2GAKFBLNHH7DPBKAHNE6U/ Ben LeahyAuckland expects a fine weekend and most of NZ enjoys dry skies during sunlight hours. Photo / Sylvie Whinray
Clarks Beach boating tragedy: Kevin McQuire admits manslaughter after Gemma and Ryder Ferregel drowned https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/clarks-beach-boating-tragedy-kevin-mcquire-admits-manslaughter-after-gemma-and-ryder-ferregel-drowned/GRZ4DQ3SZ5A25FRRTPBMO7UF2I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/clarks-beach-boating-tragedy-kevin-mcquire-admits-manslaughter-after-gemma-and-ryder-ferregel-drowned/GRZ4DQ3SZ5A25FRRTPBMO7UF2I/ Ric StevensSkipper Kevin McQuire survived and will be sentenced for manslaughter later this year. Fri, 20 Sep 2024 20:23:29 +0000 Gemma Karen Ferregel and her 10-year-old son, Ryder, drowned when their boat capsized in Manukau Harbour; Ryder’s body was never recovered. Composite image / NZME/Supplied
